name: Mr&MrsSmith
0:
”Alexa, open Mr & Mrs Smith”
”Alexa, ask Mr & Mrs Smith to find me a hotel in Italy”
”Alexa, ask Mr & Mrs Smith for inspiration”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mr and mrs smith
des:
Mr & Mrs Smith is the travel club for hotel lovers, home to a hand-picked collection of the world's best boutique and luxury hotels that you can book online or via our round-the-clock expert travel team, Smith24.

Our Alexa skill is all about inspiring you to travel – ask Mr & Mrs Smith to find you a hotel based on your personal preferences or let us inspire you with the very latest additions to our collection. You can save any of our recommendations to your favorites to listen to later and, if there’s one stay you’re swayed by, request a call back from Smith24 who can tell you more and book your entire trip for you. No account-linking or permissions required. Happy travels…

Features
– Seek inspiration from Smith’s curated collection of more than 1,000 boutique hotels worldwide
– Schedule a call back by Smith’s expert 24/7 team
– Find hotels in hundreds of destinations in the UK, Europe, the Americas, and Asia-Pacific
– Refine your search by facilities, hotel types and holiday styles (City stay? Beach break?)
– Shortlist your favorites to create your own travel wish list
